STP633-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_3rd Volume_031_chunk6
证据片段: Over 80 percent of the world's annual output of zirconium is fabricated into components for nuclear reactors

文献ID: STP633-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_3rd Volume_031_chunk6
证据片段: CANDU power reactor program will require nearly 500 Mg of zirconium

文献ID: STP633-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_3rd Volume_031_chunk6
证据片段: by 1986 the requirement will have risen to nearly 800 Mg

文献ID: STP633-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_3rd Volume_031_chunk6
证据片段: tubes which can cost as much as $80/123

文献ID: STP633-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_3rd Volume_031_chunk6
证据片段: These tubes can be made by seam welding annealed sheet

文献ID: STP633-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_3rd Volume_031_chunk6
证据片段: The weld and heat-affected zones must be recrystallized by cold work and heat treatment so that they have adequate ductility after irradiation
